mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_bedu_user ( USER_NUM, USER_ID, USER_PW, USER_NAME, REG_DATE, USER_CLS, USER_REG_DATE, USER_WITH_DRAW_YN) VALUES( #{usernum}, #{email}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{regDate}, #{cls}, #{urd}, #{udy})
mapper.select: SELECT USER_NUM AS usernum, USER_ID AS email, USER_NAME AS nickname, REG_DATE AS regDate, USER_CLS AS cls, USER_REG_DATE AS urd, USER_WITH_DRAW_YN AS udy FROM t_bedu_user WHERE USER_ID = #{email}
SELECT A.COMM_BD_NUM AS cbnum FROM T_BEDU_LIKE_CNT A INNER JOIN T_BEDU_USER B ON A.REG_ID = B.USER_ID WHERE B.USER_ID = #{email}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM B_EDU.T_BEDU_SUB WHERE SUB_NM = #{nickname}
